Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Morgan
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine: due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Morgan, Harrison and Racine, due to street blockage near Van Buren/Morgan.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #93 California/Dodge Temporary Reroute at California/Albion
ShortDescription: 93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Devon, Kedzie, Pratt, and California due to, street blockage near California/Albion.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#93 California/Dodge buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Devon, Kedzie, Pratt, and California due to, street blockage near California/Albion.

Allow extra travel time.
